name: INPayBillIntent
desc: A request to transfer money to facilitate payment of a bill.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(billPayee: INBillPayee?, from: INPaymentAccount?, transactionAmount: INPaymentAmount?, transactionScheduledDate: INDateComponentsRange?, transactionNote: String?, billType: INBillType, dueDate: INDateComponentsRange?)
items.desc: Initializes the bill pay intent object with the specified payee and transaction details.

items.name: var dueDate: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The due date of the payment.

items.name: var fromAccount: INPaymentAccount?
items.desc: The user account containing the funds for the payment.

items.name: var transactionAmount: INPaymentAmount?
items.desc: The amount to transfer from the user to the payee.

items.name: var transactionNote: String?
items.desc: A note to associate with the payment transaction.

items.name: var transactionScheduledDate: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The scheduled date for the payment, as requested by the user.
